name: Crescent Loom: Action Potential Explorer
description:
This project is a fork of Crescent Loom, an in-development game about weaving the bodies and brains of underwater creatures. It's a short interactive explorable that shows the dynamics of action potentials in neurons. It has been designed to expose neuron electrophysiology in a way that is easy to play & tinker with.

[ More information & guidebook ]
